column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant | Participants # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text='' Before you board the plane you should consider picking up a bottle of water and a snack in case they do n't have anything you 'd like to drink or eat on the flight .
#id=2
#text=You should also stop at the restroom so , hopefully , you wo n't have to go to the bathroom during the flight .
#id=3
#text=If you have an assigned seat for your flight do n't rush to get on because it 'll just mean sitting there for a longer period of time .
#id=4
#text=Once you are ready to board just be patient with everyone else who is flying and with the flight attendants .
#id=5
#text=Once you have found your seat store any large items overhead and keep whatever you might want during the flight in the seat-back .
#id=6
#text=I suggest putting your electronic devices there , headphones , books etc. .
#id=7
#text=I also like to make sure to have gum , my snack and my water readily available .
#id=8
#text=If you have a smaller item you can put that underneath the seat in front of you .
#id=9
#text=It is a good idea to chew gum at least at the start of the flight so you avoid having your ears pop .
#text=Try to stay hydrated during your flight , and keep your seat-belt on whenever you are sitting down .
